title: Marvel’s Fourth Phase and the ‘Big Little Lies’ Season 2 Letdown | The Watch
description:
A lot of news came out of Comic-Con this weekend, including what to expect from the Marvel Cinematic Universe over the next few years, both in theaters (1:00) and on the small screen (21:52). The second season of ‘Big Little Lies’ felt like a seven-episode show that was dying to be 12 episodes long (41:26), and ‘Veronica Mars’ is back and playing hard on nostalgia (50:09).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Andy Greenwald and Sean Fennessey

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
